/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, lined with lush green trees and shrubs, stretches out into the distance, disappearing into the horizon. A sidewalk runs parallel to the street, inviting pedestrians for a leisurely stroll. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the background, mountains rise majestically, adding a touch of natural beauty to the urban landscape. The image does not contain any text or discernible actions by objects or individuals. The relative positions of the objects suggest a well-planned urban layout, with the street serving as a main thoroughfare and the greenery providing a refreshing contrast to the concrete structures. The mountains in the distance add a sense of depth and scale to the image. Overall, the image captures the harmonious coexistence of urban development and natural beauty in Beijing.
